commandExecutionError: There was an error executing this command

clear.description: Clear an amount of messages from a channel
clear.atLeastOne: Sorry but you must at least delete one message !
clear.atMostHundred: Sorry but I can't clean more than 100 messages
clear.nan: Please enter a number as an argument !
clear.noArg: Please enter the amount of messages you want to clear, eg : !clear 5

help.embedDescription: Use `<prefix>help <command>` to display help for the command `<command>`

language.description: Command allowing to set the bot's prefered language
language.notSupported:
**<language>** can not be handled at the moment. Here is the list of supported languages:
<list>
language.updated: The bot's language has been changed !

prefix.description: Command allowing to set the prefix for the commands
prefix.help: `prefix` command usage : `<prefix>prefix <newPrefix>` where <newPrefix> is the prefix that will be used to call bot's commands
prefix.noArg: You can't use the `prefix` command without arguments !
prefix.update: The command prefix has changed : you can now call a command with <prefix>
prefix.updateError: The prefix must be a one word string ! You tried to give the following one : <prefix>

reactionrole.description: Add a role to a user after message reaction
reactionrole.embedDescription: Choosing a role allows you to get access to the right channels !
reactionrole.noRoleChannel: There are no channel configured at the moment
reactionrole.roleChannel: The bot will assign roles on message reactions in <channel>
reactionrole.roleChannelError: `<channel>` is not an existing channel on this server !
reactionrole.roleChannelUpdate: The bot will now listen to reactions in <channel>
